name: Toy Stunt Bike
overview: Toy Stunt Bike is a motorbike trial game. Like the name suggests players use toy bikes instead of real ones and the tracks are also set in environments of a typical house and it´s surroundings with the garden, a bathroom and a bedroom as example locations (there are 60 racetracks in all) giving the game a similar atmosphere to the Micro Machines series. The game is presented in 3D and uses a third person perspective from the side. The game features online leaderboards allowing the player to compare his results to those of other players.
